scripts.clean: pnpm clean-images && cd ./packages/emoji-to-othermoji && pnpm clean && cd ../../packages/astro-plugins/ && pnpm clean && cd ../../packages/jsdoc2ts && pnpm clean && cd ../dataservice && pnpm clean && cd ../../websites/personal-site && pnpm clean
scripts.build: pnpm run setup && cd websites/personal-site/ && pnpm astro build
scripts.setup: cd ./packages/social-feed/ && pnpm copy-feed && cd ../../packages/jsdoc2ts && pnpm build &&cd ../../packages/astro-plugins/ && pnpm build && cd ../../packages/emoji-to-othermoji && pnpm build && cd ../dataservice && pnpm build && cd ../../ && pnpm optimise-images
